ygData.subject: Re: skills and points
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *snippage of the entire thread to date* Yep - for non-combat-related skills, the formula of (lvl + 1) * 5 applies.  Trade skills have no caps, with the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 25 Aug 1999, Curtis Bennett wrote:

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> Neat! Does the (level + 1) * 5 formula apply to things like begging,
> alcohol tolerance, and sense heading as well?
>

*snippage of the entire thread to date*

Yep - for non-combat-related skills, the formula of (lvl + 1) * 5
applies. Trade skills have no caps, with the exception of Fishing.
--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
